extendedIngredients.name: canola oil
extendedIngredients.originalString: Oil - use any flavorless oil like canola, corn, vegetable or safflower oil. I have used canola oil.

extendedIngredients.name: light brown sugar
extendedIngredients.originalString: Light brown sugar - ½ cup, packed

extendedIngredients.name: orange zest
extendedIngredients.originalString: Orange zest - from half of the orange.

extendedIngredients.name: sugar
extendedIngredients.originalString: Powdered sugar or Icing sugar or Confectioned Sugar - 1 cup, sifted

recipes.title: Eggless Orange Cake with orange icing (Vegan Cake)
recipes.instructions: Pre-heat the oven to 375 degree F or 190 degree C for at least 10 minutes.Butter and flour 9 inch round cake pan. Light butter it or spray it with non stick spray. Then sprinkle about a tablespoon of flour. Now swirl the pan so flour will stick to greased surface (all over pan and also around the edges). Now invert the pan over a sink or garbage and tap it gently with your hand to remove excess flour.Keep it aside your prepared cake pan.Take dry ingredients in a bowl (cake flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and brown sugar).Whisk it well so everything gets incorporated.Now take wet ingredients (oil, orange juice, vanilla extract, vinegar) in a bowl along with orange zest. Whisk it well.Add wet to dry.And whisk till all comes together and becomes a smooth batter.Now pour the batter in to prepared pan. Tap it lightly on you counter, it will help to remove air bubbles from batter.Bake it into pre-heated oven for 25-30 minutes. Always check 2-3 minutes before mentioned time. Check by inserting a toothpick in the center of the cake. If it comes out clear then cake is ready.Let it cool in the pan for at least 10 minutes. Then run the knife around the edges to loosen the cake. And remove it to the cooling rack. Let it cool completely before decorating or spreading icing.Now cake is cooled completely. Before we make and drizzle the icing on the cake, put the plate at the bottom the cake for easier cleaning.Let's make orange flavored icing. Take powdered sugar or icing sugar in a bowl.Start adding tablespoon of orange juice at time and keep mixing till you get smooth and pouring icing consistency.Add orange zest to the icing. Mix it well.Now drizzle the icing on the cake and let it flow itself.If not then use butter knife of back of spoon to spread it evenlyLet the icing dry completely before you slice the cake.

steps.step: Pre-heat the oven to 375 degree F or 190 degree C for at least 10 minutes.Butter and flour 9 inch round cake pan. Light butter it or spray it with non stick spray. Then sprinkle about a tablespoon of flour. Now swirl the pan so flour will stick to greased surface (all over pan and also around the edges). Now invert the pan over a sink or garbage and tap it gently with your hand to remove excess flour.Keep it aside your prepared cake pan.Take dry ingredients in a bowl (cake flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and brown sugar).
Whisk it well so everything gets incorporated.Now take wet ingredients (oil, orange juice, vanilla extract, vinegar) in a bowl along with orange zest.
Add wet to dry.And whisk till all comes together and becomes a smooth batter.Now pour the batter in to prepared pan. Tap it lightly on you counter, it will help to remove air bubbles from batter.
Bake it into pre-heated oven for 25-30 minutes. Always check 2-3 minutes before mentioned time. Check by inserting a toothpick in the center of the cake. If it comes out clear then cake is ready.
Let it cool in the pan for at least 10 minutes. Then run the knife around the edges to loosen the cake. And remove it to the cooling rack.
Let it cool completely before decorating or spreading icing.Now cake is cooled completely. Before we make and drizzle the icing on the cake, put the plate at the bottom the cake for easier cleaning.
Let's make orange flavored icing. Take powdered sugar or icing sugar in a bowl.Start adding tablespoon of orange juice at time and keep mixing till you get smooth and pouring icing consistency.
Add orange zest to the icing.
Mix it well.Now drizzle the icing on the cake and let it flow itself.If not then use butter knife of back of spoon to spread it evenly
Let the icing dry completely before you slice the cake.
